title: OpenAI explains why ChatGPT became too sycophantic
summary: OpenAI has published a postmortem on the recent sycophancy issues with the default AI model powering ChatGPT, GPT-4o â€” issues that forced the company to roll back an update to the model released last week. Over the weekend, following the GPT-4o model update, users on social media noted that ChatGPT began responding in an overly […]
